document_data.mainbody:
Achieving Wealth Through Proper Grooming was a book published several decades before 1372 DR.
As of the , a copy of Achieving Wealth Through Proper Grooming was stashed on a bookshelf in Castle Exeltiss basement. The familys scion mismanaged the once-flourishing winery, and the bookshelves in the castle basement were covered in a thick layer of dust, evidence of a dire literary neglect. The shelf, however, hid a secret passage from the basement to the castles second floor and the lords chambers.
